alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 11:28AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Persistent freezing fog across northeast Nevada... Patchy freezing fog continues mainly east of Battle Mountain across much of Elko county. The fog is lifting in most valleys to a low cloud deck. However, elevated roadways and passes will still experience fog through the early afternoon hours. Visibility could drop to less than one half mile at times in the denser fog but conditions overall will improve, especially in valley areas as well as along I-80 east of Battle Mountain and US-93 in Elko County. Motorists should continue to use caution this morning as very cold surface sub- freezing temperatures remain with some slick spots on roadways possible. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
